jobInfo.postDescription:
We are looking for EDVT Engineer to join Cisco Catalyst campus core /access Switching testing team in Cisco CRDC (China R&D Center), Shanghai. You will have the opportunity to work with the talents in Cisco engineering to develop/test the Core/Access Switching with cutting edge technology and methodologies. 
Cisco Catalyst campus core and distribution LAN switches provide a broad range of deployment options in features, scale, port speeds, and interface types. These fixed and modular switches have been designed to extend intent-based networking from the edge to the core and beyond. In a world that is always changing, you need a network that constantly learns, adapts, and protects.
 
Responsibilities:
● Review HW design specification, create test plans and generate test tools under standard HW test processes and procedures.
● Set up HW test environment with UUT and/or instruments/cable plants/etc.
● Execute manual/automated test suites according to test plan and as per guidance from Cisco tech leads.
● Work with HW/SW designers to troubleshoot and root cause issues found during the test.
● Handle various test instruments like environmental chambers, AC or DC power supplies, traffic generator and a wide range of networking equipment necessary to execute HW test suites.
● Work is reviewed for soundness of technical judgment and overall adequacy and accuracy.
● Uses acquired professional knowledge to make decisions.  Exercises judgment within defined standards and consults with Cisco tech leads.
Requirements:
● Basic knowledge of TCP/IP network protocol and Network Communication.
● Basic knowledge of general switching product hardware architecture and its functionality.
● Proactive and willing to take challenges.
● Teamwork and strong communication skills are essential.
● Experience in Scripting Languages and tools: Python/TCL/Linux 
● Experience in testing instruments and utilities such as IXIA, SPIRENT….
● The knowledge of the optics will be preferred.
● Excellent written and verbal English skills.
Educational Background：
Typically requires MSEE/CS combined with ~1+ years of related experience, or BSEE/CS combined with ~3+ years related experience.
 
Location： 
Shanghai

我们正在寻找EDVT工程师加入位于上海思科CRDC（中国研发中心）的思科Catalyst园区核心/接入交换机测试团队。您将有机会与思科工程领域的人才合作，利用尖端技术和方法开发/测试核心/接入交换机。
 
Cisco Catalyst园区核心和分布式LAN交换机在功能、规模、端口速度和接口类型方面提供了广泛的部署选项。这些固定和模块化交换机的设计目的是将基于意图的网络从边缘扩展到核心和更远的地方。在一个不断变化的世界里，你需要一个不断学习、适应和保护的网络。
 
 
职责：
 
根据标准硬件测试流程和程序，审查硬件设计规范，制定测试计划并生成测试工具。
 
利用UUT和/或仪器/电缆设备等设置硬件测试环境。
 
根据测试计划和思科技术负责人的指导执行手动/自动测试套件。
 
与硬件/软件设计人员合作，对测试过程中发现的问题进行故障排除和根本原因分析。
 
处理各种测试仪器，如环境测试箱、交流或直流电源、流量发生器和执行硬件测试套件所需的各种网络设备。
 
对工作进行审查，以确定技术判断的合理性以及总体的充分性和准确性。
 
利用获得的专业知识做出决策。在规定的标准范围内进行判断，并咨询思科技术经理。
 
要求：
 
TCP/IP网络协议和网络通信的基本知识。
 
一般交换产品硬件架构及其功能的基本知识。
 
积极主动，乐于接受挑战。
 
团队合作和强大的沟通能力是必不可少的。
 
脚本语言和工具经验：Python/TCL/Linux
 
具有测试仪器和设备的经验，如IXIA、SPIRENT…。
 
最好具备光学知识。
 
优秀的英语书写和口语能力。
 
教育背景：
 
通常要求MSEE/CS学历约1年以上的相关经验，或BSEE/CS学历约3年以上的有关经验。
 
地点：
 
上海

brandComInfo.introduce: 上海辰方资讯有限公司是一家在移动互联网、电信领域提供IT解决方案与软硬件服务的公司，辰方已成为某国际知名外企的重要合作伙伴，为客户提供包括应用开发和维护、网络服务，嵌入式软硬件设计、测试等优质服务，帮助客户实现投资收益大化，并使之更专注于自身核心业务。
